titles.title: DRAIN THE SWAMP Act
Decentralizing and Reorganizing Agency Infrastructure Nation-wide To Harness Efficient Services, Workforce Administration, and Management Practices Act
DRAIN THE SWAMP Act

To require the head of each Executive agency to relocate 30 percent of the employees assigned to the headquarters of the Executive agency to duty stations outside the Washington metropolitan area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
